reuters.title: JEUMONT-SCHNEIDER SETS UP CANADIAN SUBSIDIARY
reuters.body: Jeumont-Schneider, a subsidiary of Schneider SA <SCHN.PA>, announced in a statement the creation of a Canadian subsidiary, Jeumont-Schneider of Canada. The new subsidiary will work on developing Jeumont-Schneider's Canadian sales, particularly for its electro-mechanical and electronics goods. The company also said it had signed a distribution agreement with <Beel Electronics> for sales of the French group's speed variators in Canada. Reuter 
